unnormalised: Arre bhai, my scooter gives only 30 kmpl now, used to be 45 kmpl when I bought it! Maybe it's time to switch to an EV, or just push it the last 100 meters.
normalised: Arre bhai, my scooter gives only thirty kilometer per liter now, used to be forty five kilometer per liter when I bought it! Maybe it's time to switch to an E-V, or just push it the last one hundred meters.
